trans-unit.source: Populates <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects with XML Schema data type definitions for .NET Framework types that are serialized using SOAP encoding.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>对象具有 XML 架构数据类型的.NET Framework 类型的使用 SOAP 编码进行序列化的定义。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding of SOAP Web service messages is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码的 SOAP Web 服务消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class provides a programmatic representation of an XML Schema definition language (XSD) document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>类提供的编程表示形式的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 文档。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: You should not use the SoapSchemaExporter class directly.
trans-unit.target: 不应直接使用 SoapSchemaExporter 类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter"></xref> class, which supplies the collection of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects to which XML Schema element declarations are to be added.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter"></xref>类，该类提供的集合<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>元素声明将添加到的 XML 架构的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: You should not create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
A collection of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects to which element declarations obtained from type mappings are to be added.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>到哪些元素获取从类型映射的声明是要添加的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到适用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>对象数据类型定义的每个 SOAP 编码消息定义的元素部分。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: 内部 WSDL 消息定义的元素部分的.NET Framework 类型映射。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object a data type definition for each of the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message definition.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到适用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>对象数据类型定义的每个 SOAP 编码消息定义的元素部分。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: 内部 WSDL 消息定义的元素部分的.NET Framework 类型映射。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to export a type definition for the parent element of the WSDL parts; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要导出的 WSDL 部分; 的父元素的类型定义否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds to the applicable <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object a data type definition for a .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到适用<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>对象的.NET Framework 类型的数据类型定义。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: You should not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaExporter> class directly.
An internal mapping between a .NET Framework type and an XML Schema element.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 类型和 XML 架构元素之间的内部映射。
